017package org.microbean.loader.jackson;
018
019import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.Map;
022import java.util.Objects;
023
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonAnySetter;
025import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonAutoDetect;
026
027import org.microbean.development.annotation.Experimental;
028import org.microbean.development.annotation.Incomplete;
029
030import org.microbean.qualifier.Qualifiers;
031
032/**
033 * A Java object that represents a tree-like configuration structure,
034 * using Jackson mapping constructs to make things easier.
035 *
036 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
037 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
038 */
039@Experimental
040@Incomplete
041@JsonAutoDetect(creatorVisibility = JsonAutoDetect.Visibility.NONE,
042                fieldVisibility = JsonAutoDetect.Visibility.NONE,
043                getterVisibility = JsonAutoDetect.Visibility.NONE,
044                isGetterVisibility = JsonAutoDetect.Visibility.NONE,
045                setterVisibility = JsonAutoDetect.Visibility.NONE)
046public class Configuration {
047
048  private Map<? extends String, ?> qualifiersMap;
049
050  private final Map<String, Object> any;
051
052  /**
053   * Creates a new {@link Configuration}.
054   */
055  public Configuration() {
056    super();
057    this.qualifiersMap = Map.of();
058    this.any = new LinkedHashMap<>();
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Returns a {@link Qualifiers} representing all qualifiers in the
063   * {@link Configuration}.
064   *
065   * @return a {@link Qualifiers} representing all qualifiers in the
066   * {@link Configuration}
067   *
068   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
069   *
070   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
071   *
072   * @threadsafety This method is <strong>not</strong> safe for
073   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
074   */
075  public final Qualifiers<? extends String, ?> qualifiers() {
076    return this.qualifiers(List.of());
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Returns a {@link Qualifiers} representing all qualifiers in the
081   * {@link Configuration} associated with the supplied sequence of
082   * names.
083   *
084   * @param names a sequence of names identifying a path to the root
085   * of a tree of qualifiers; may be {@code null}
086   *
087   * @return a {@link Qualifiers} representing all qualifiers in the
088   * {@link Configuration} associated with the supplied sequence of
089   * names
090   *
091   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
092   *
093   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
094   *
095   * @threadsafety This method is <strong>not</strong> safe for
096   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
097   */
098  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
099  public final Qualifiers<? extends String, ?> qualifiers(final Iterable<? extends String> names) {
100    Map<? extends String, ?> map = this.qualifiersMap;
101    if (map == null || map.isEmpty()) {
102      return Qualifiers.of();
103    }
104    map = new LinkedHashMap<>(map);
105    if (names != null) {
106      for (final String name : names) {
107        Object value = map.get(name);
108        if (value == null) {
109          return Qualifiers.of();
110        } else if (value instanceof Map) {
111          map = (Map<? extends String, ?>)value;
112        }
113      }
114    }
115    map.entrySet().removeIf(e -> e.getValue() instanceof Map);
116    return Qualifiers.of(map); // TODO: check
117  }
118
119  /**
120   * Returns an {@link Object} in this {@link Configuration} indexed
121   * under the supplied {@code name}.
122   *
123   * @param name the name; must not be {@code null}
124   *
125   * @return the associated {@link Object}, or {@code null}
126   *
127   * @nullability This method may return {@code null}.
128   *
129   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
130   *
131   * @threadsafety This method is <strong>not</strong> safe for
132   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
133   */
134  protected final Object any(final String name) {
135    return this.any.get(name);
136  }
137
138  @JsonAnySetter
139  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
140  private final void any(final String name, final Object value) {
141    if (name.equals("@qualifiers")) {
142      if (value == null) {
143        this.qualifiersMap = Map.of();
144      } else if (value instanceof Qualifiers) {
145        this.qualifiersMap = ((Qualifiers<? extends String, ?>)value).toMap();
146      } else if (value instanceof Map) {
147        this.qualifiersMap = (Map<? extends String, ?>)value;
148      } else {
149        this.any.put(name, value);
150      }
151    } else {
152      this.any.put(name, value);
153    }
154  }
155
156  /**
157   * Returns a hashcode for this {@link Configuration}.
158   *
159   * @return a hashcode for this {@link Configuration}
160   *
161   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
162   * idempotent and deterministic.
163   *
164   * @threadsafety This method is <strong>not</strong> safe for
165   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
166   */
167  @Override // Object
168  public int hashCode() {
169    return Objects.hash(this.qualifiersMap, this.any);
170  }
171
172  /**
173   * Returns {@code true} if the supplied {@link Object} is equal to
174   * this {@link Configuration}.
175   *
176   * @param other the {@link Object} to test; may be {@code null}
177   *
178   * @return {@code true} if the supplied {@link Object} is equal to
179   * this {@link Configuration}
180   *
181   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
182   * idempotent and deterministic.
183   *
184   * @threadsafety This method is <strong>not</strong> safe for
185   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
186   */
187  @Override // Object
188  public boolean equals(final Object other) {
189    if (other == this) {
190      return true;
191    } else if (other != null && other.getClass() == this.getClass()) {
192      final Configuration her = (Configuration)other;
193      return
194        Objects.equals(this.qualifiersMap, her.qualifiersMap) &&
195        Objects.equals(this.any, her.any);
196    } else {
197      return false;
198    }
199  }
200
201  /**
202   * Returns a {@link String} representation of this {@link
203   * Configuration}.
204   *
205   * <p>The format of the returned {@link String} is deliberately
206   * undefined and subject to change between revisions of this class
207   * without notice.</p>
208   *
209   * @return a {@link String} representation of this {@link
210   * Configuration}
211   *
212   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
213   * return {@code null}.
214   *
215   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
216   * idempotent and deterministic.
217   *
218   * @threadsafety This method is <strong>not</strong> safe for
219   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
220   */
221  @Override // Object
222  public String toString() {
223    return this.qualifiersMap + " " + this.any;
224  }
225
226}
